attributes.action: Stop Giving Benefits To Immigrants Who Are Able To Work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick of hearing about immigrants coming into my country illegally and then claiming benefits they should not be getting. Why should I work hard and pay ridiculous amounts of tax to fund their lives of luxury? It is about time the Government stopped wasting money on people who don't deserve it. If people want to come and live in our country they should have to work like we all do.

government_responses.details:
